column3: This logic is already included in a more complete way in #6134 (which replaced #6131)\n

@morcos Correct, however your latest commit in #6134 depends on, and tries to work around the current mempool trimming bug in a way that only works for one special case.  A better approach would be to fix mempool trimming by making it aware of priority.  (As long as priority is a supported concept, if not priority should be removed entirely, not by introducing bugs to make it fail.)\n
@laanwj this can be closed now that #6134 is merged\n
